response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an experience that promises to exceed your expectations. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, we believe its value lies well above its face value. For this extraordinary product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $150. This opportunity is exclusive to you, and I hope you'll find it worth considering. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 150}
